alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 7:26AM CDT until September 29 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 726 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mantador, or 23 miles west of Wahpeton, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lidgerwood, Mooreton, Dwight, Mantador, Barney, Galchutt and Stiles. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 15 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
